Johnny Depp made a surprise cameo at the 2022 MTV Video Music Awards telling the audience he "needed the work" as he was projected on stage as the channel's famous Moon Man astronaut mascot.

articles.title: Watch Harry Styles get chicken nuggets thrown at him during New York City show - NME
articles.description: During his fifth consecutive show in New York, Harry Styles received an unusual gift from an audience member: two cold chicken nuggets.
articles.content:
During the fifth date of his monthlong Madison Square Garden residency in New York, Harry Styles received an unusual gift from an audience member: two cold, stale chicken nuggets.

articles.title: Ozzy Osbourne confirms he is moving back to UK as everything is 'ridiculous' in the US - The Mirror
articles.description: Black Sabbath frontman Ozzy Osbourne is set to up sticks and return to his homeland with wife Sharon after spending the best past of the last two decades in California
articles.content:
Ozzy Osbourne is set to permanently return to the UK with wife Sharon after several years living in Los Angeles.
